FuncDef:
The role command configures the local device as a reflector or client in an iNOF system.
The undo role command restores the default configuration. The role command configures the local device as a reflector or client in an iNOF system. The undo role command restores the default configuration. By default, no role is configured for the local device in an iNOF system. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures a device as a client.
-

Configures a device as a reflector.
-
